channel.title: Michael Barrett : Abouthalf.com
channel.description: This site is like a sketchbook that keeps going and going. This site pulls snapshots, found images, and digital paintings into a long streaming grid of pictures.
channel.generator: Michael's gnarled hands and brow sweat

item.title: Flamingo Poppies
item.description: Springtime walks with the pup present poppies and flocks of flamingos
item.content:encoded: Springtime walks with the pup present poppies and flocks of flamingos
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: Lilac and Lavendar
item.description: Lilac, lavender, dandelions, and maples. Spring growth, colors, sights, and smells
item.content:encoded: Lilac, lavender, dandelions, and maples. Spring growth, colors, sights, and smells
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: Buoy
item.description: Buoyed by spring flowers.
item.content:encoded: Buoyed by spring flowers.

item.title: Coastal Weather
item.description: A portrait study overlaid with images of the Oregon coast
item.content:encoded: A portrait study overlaid with images of the Oregon coast

item.title: Dandelions
item.description: Wintertime thinking about springtime dandelions

item.title: Harlequin

item.title: Street Meat
item.description: One and three steaks. While walking the dog I snapped a photo of misplaced groceries. 12"x 18" acrylic and inkjet on canvas
item.content:encoded: One and three steaks. While walking the dog I snapped a photo of misplaced groceries. 12"x 18" acrylic and inkjet on canvas
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: Denied Portrait
item.description: A tomato-red turtleneck sweater
item.content:encoded: A tomato-red turtleneck sweater

item.title: Too early for tomatoes
item.description: It’s too early for tomatoes, and too late for turtlenecks. Portrait study from a Uniqlo ad, with a sketch of a tomato and a snapshot of poppies
item.content:encoded: It’s too early for tomatoes, and too late for turtlenecks. Portrait study from a Uniqlo ad, with a sketch of a tomato and a snapshot of poppies
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: 15 new paintings
item.description: 15 new paintings - 12" by 12" monotypes on canvas mounted to panel. Ink-jet prints layered with paint and pencil.
item.content:encoded: 15 new paintings - 12" by 12" monotypes on canvas mounted to panel. Ink-jet prints layered with paint and pencil.
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: Spring Forward
item.description: Spring Forward into a new shirt under the cherry blossoms. Portrait study from a Uniqlo ad. cherry trees in St. Johns.
item.content:encoded: Spring Forward into a new shirt under the cherry blossoms. Portrait study from a Uniqlo ad. cherry trees in St. Johns.
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: When life gives you lemons make concrete 🍋
item.description: Wandering around St Johns taking photos of textures to blend into digital painting. I put some lemons on top for freshness. XOXO
item.content:encoded: Wandering around St Johns taking photos of textures to blend into digital painting. I put some lemons on top for freshness. XOXO
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: Recapitulated with squares
item.description: A portrait study from a Uniqlo ad which seems to be remembering it's beginnings

item.title: Bundle up, it’s raining
item.description: A portrait study from a Uniqlo ad with graphic clouds and ancient meteorological symbols

item.title: Finally some sun in Portland
item.description: Dashboard camera, graphic clouds, and a diminished portrait study.

item.title: Overlapping idealizations
item.description: A portrait study from a Uniqlo ad paired with an architectural rendering of the deceased Scottish Rite temple in Tacoma.
item.content:encoded: A portrait study from a Uniqlo ad paired with an architectural rendering of the deceased Scottish Rite temple in Tacoma.
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: Sweater weather. Portrait study from a Uniqlo advertisement.
item.description: A portrait study from a Uniqlo ad with a pattern built from found photos of autumn leaves
item.content:encoded: A portrait study from a Uniqlo ad with a pattern built from found photos of autumn leaves

item.title: Recent work. Three printer paintings. Inkjet on Canvas with Acrylic, mounted on birch panel.
item.description: A digital painting, printed on canvas, mounted to panel, and painted. Printer errors are embraced.
item.content:encoded: A digital painting, printed on canvas, mounted to panel, and painted. Printer errors are embraced.
item.author: mb@abouthalf.com (Michael Barrett)

item.title: Late night, walking the dog
item.description: Do you ever really look around at night? It's weird.

item.title: Waiting for a drink. Waiting at the airport. Waiting waiting waiting.

item.title: Ghosts in the walls of an old house in Portland.

item.title: Sunday sunset train to Portland. Wednesday sunrise train to Seattle. Notes and scribbles. Painted sunset over Tacoma. Shadowy figures.

item.title: Wednesday morning commute. Bright, sunny, warm, and humid.
